desc: Shop Gem Quality Opal Rings, Opal Necklaces, and Opal Charms by Gem Cutter + Goldsmith Curtis R Jewellery. Handcrafted One of a Kind Heirloom Pieces with Genuine Natural Gemstones in Yellow Gold + Sterling Silver. Custom Made to Order Jewelry. Build your own Opal Ring or Opal Charm with Australian or Ethiopian Opal
